data.text: @ColbysBack @spk4whatsright @thehill In other words, the CDC/FDA/whoever else claims to actually care about keeping people healthy need to go back to the drawing board, preferably without gobbling up more taxpayer $$.

@spk4whatsright @thehill Sweden doesn’t offer the vaccine for children under 12, aside from those at risk of severe disease. In Finland, the country’s public health agency has stopped short of recommending vaccination for healthy kids ages 5 to 11. Norway has taken a similar approach.
@thehill Journalist, legacy media and social media are furious that Florida is not taking Big Pharma medicine (money).
@spk4whatsright @thehill Your article does not support your assertion. You did not read it.

@art_interesting @thehill #ICYMI, Sweden is an outlier in Europe and the world.
